channel.title: Windows/Linux VPS' w/ Free webhosting, unmetered cache hosting, offloaded MySQL!
channel.description:
[b]UPDATE: There has been some price adjustments. Please check them out below if you have already seen this topic.[/b] [b]NOTE: Frantech is a Canadian based company, therefore we are not affected by DMCA. We have no problems telling Jagex to bite our shiny metal asses if they contact us about a private server.[/b] Hey guys, I'm a representative from Frantech Solutions. We've been wanting to kick off a service specifically for hosting Runescape Private Servers for a while now. Now that we're almost settled into our new datacenter (Pittock Internet Exchange) in Portland, Oregon, we've decided that we're ready to start up a Runescape specific hosting service. At the moment, we have 7 hardware nodes (machines that the VPS's are run on). I'll list them and their spec's below.
Hostname: talho.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: renton.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: eureka.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: anemone.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: dominic.pdxhost.net Operating System: Windows Server 2003 x64 Datacenter Edition Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 16GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5320's - Each processor is 4 cores for a total of 8 1.86GHz cores - Four 500GB SATA II hard drives
Hostname: dewey.pdxhost.net Operating System: Windows Server 2003 x64 Datacenter Edition Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 16GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5320's - Each processor is 4 cores for a total of 8 1.86GHz cores - Four 500GB SATA II hard drives
Hostname: axel.pdxhost.net Operating System: Windows Server 2003 x64 Datacenter Edition Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 16GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5320's - Each processor is 4 cores for a total of 8 1.86GHz cores - Four 500GB SATA II hard drives
With your Frantech VPS, you also get: [ul][li]Free Webhosting[/li] [li]Free Unmetered Cache/Client Hosting[/li] [li]Free Offloaded MySQL[/li] [li]Free Off-server Backup (5GB)[/li][/ul] The Frantech Runescape VPS Plans are as follows:
[RS128] - 128 MB RAM (192MB Burst) - 5GB Hard disk space - $6/month USD [RS256] - 256 MB RAM (386MB Burst) - 10GB Hard disk space - $9/month USD [RS512] - 512 MB RAM (768MB Burst) - 20GB Hard disk space - $12.50/month USD [RS1024] - 1 GB RAM (1.5GB Burst) - 40GB Hard disk space - $25/month USD [RS2048] - 2 GB RAM - 80GB Hard disk space - $45/month USD [RS4096] - 4 GB RAM - 160GB Hard disk space - $99/month USD
[size=16pt]Order here: http://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?gid=8[/size] Operating System Options: Most Linux Distributions (just ask), Windows Server 2003 Enterprise Edition 64-bit Windows is [b]now FREE![/b] (We demo'd Windows Server 2008 Enterprise but it was highly impractical. It required 600MB RAM just to boot. Sorry guys, blame Microsoft.) To contact us, you can: Submit a ticket at http://my.frantech.ca/ Join us in our IRC channel at irc.deltaanime.net #frantech or message djt_93@hotmail.com on MSN. All hardware is owned, colocated, and operated by Frantech and Frantech alone. 99.9% uptime for now, but may rise as we get settled in more. Frantech uses Virtuozzo for Guest System Virtualization. [Xen is available on a per request basis -- submit a ticket] [size=13pt]We offer 24 hour free trials of our VPS's.[/size] -- Submit a ticket requesting a trial. Include the plan, and the time you want the trial in the ticket. [b]Some pictures ------------------[/b] [b]Screenshot of top in an ssh session with talho:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/16_cpuzzzzz.png [b]Xeon 5520 and heatsink:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAG0071.jpg [b]Xeon 5520:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAG0072.jpg [b]RAM:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAG0075.jpg [b]More Xeon 5520's:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_069.jpg [b]Chassis of talho:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_070.jpg [b]talho almost assembled:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_073.jpg [b]talho almost assembled again:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_074.jpg [b]RAID 1 performance on talho:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_076.jpg (reads 11GB/s, writes 110MB/s - our RAID 10 setup does 11GB/s read and 250MB/s write) [b]------------------[/b] [b]Last but not least... /proc/cpuinfo of talho:[/b] http://frantech.ca/pdx/cpuinfo Looking forward to seeing you, mepholic/gikid and Frantech staff -- mods: I talked to Taharok on IRC, he told me he will approve this.

item.title: Windows/Linux VPS' w/ Free webhosting, unmetered cache hosting, offloaded MySQL!
item.dc:creator: @xX_Nicole_Xx xX Nicole Xx
item.description:
@xX_Nicole_Xx wrote:

[quote=“gikid, post:6, topic:308464”][quote author=xX Nicole Xx link=topic=402568.msg3046329#msg3046329 date=1259481453]

How is this business going?

How much does everything cost?

Why does it come up with this?

[quote]The site’s security certificate is not trusted!
You attempted to reach my.frantech.ca, but the server presented a certificate issued by an entity that is not trusted by your computer’s operating system. This may mean that the server has generated its own security credentials, which Google Chrome cannot rely on for identity information, or an attacker may be trying to intercept your communications. You should not proceed, especially if you have never seen this warning before for this site.[/quote]

And why are all the webpages down?

I believe their certificate expired, They will most likely renew it.
The information is fine, i’ve used it :p.
Plus, most info sent using paypay gets Paypal’s own SSL encryption.
[/quote]

The certificate is just expired as Nicole said. It still works fine for encryption purposes, so don’t worry. Fran has the new certificate, he’s just been extremely busy recently. We’ll get it installed as soon as possible.[/quote]

Can’t wait to see the new site when fran gets done

Read full topic
item.source: Windows/Linux VPS' w/ Free webhosting, unmetered cache hosting, offloaded MySQL!

@xX_Nicole_Xx wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:18, topic:306413”]How is this business going?

How much does everything cost?

Why does it come up with this?

[quote]The site’s security certificate is not trusted!
You attempted to reach my.frantech.ca, but the server presented a certificate issued by an entity that is not trusted by your computer’s operating system. This may mean that the server has generated its own security credentials, which Google Chrome cannot rely on for identity information, or an attacker may be trying to intercept your communications. You should not proceed, especially if you have never seen this warning before for this site.[/quote]

And why are all the webpages down?[/quote]

I believe their certificate expired, They will most likely renew it.
The information is fine, i’ve used it :p.
Plus, most info sent using paypal gets Paypal’s own SSL encryption.

item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

How is this business going?

How much does everything cost?

Why does it come up with this?

The site's security certificate is not trusted! You attempted to reach my.frantech.ca, but the server presented a certificate issued by an entity that is not trusted by your computer's operating system. This may mean that the server has generated its own security credentials, which Google Chrome cannot rely on for identity information, or an attacker may be trying to intercept your communications. You should not proceed, especially if you have never seen this warning before for this site.

And why are all the webpages down?

item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Vpsland sucks. They have retardedly oversold hardware. If we do ever end up having as many customers as vpsland, we will be sure to at least have the hardware infrastructure to support our customers as well as we do now.

I know they are horrid, but the amount of customers they have is phenomenal.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows/Linux VPS' w/ Free webhosting, unmetered cache hosting, offloaded MySQL!
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“gikid, post:4, topic:306452”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=402568.msg2991276#msg2991276 date=1255298812]
Just wondering, is this a small company (you and some friends/etc) or what? This is pretty impressive.
[/quote]

Hey T4_,
I wouldn’t really call Frantech small, maybe medium sized at this point. WHMCS reports 1096 active clients at the moment. We currently have 292 running VPS’s. These are an assortment of different kinds of customers. RO, Gunz, WoW, Runescape, and even some Professional Businesses. I am not the owner of Frantech, I’m technical support. Francisco Dias (Delta from DeltaAnime) is the owner. He runs this company for a living, so it’s not like we’re going to be going out of business, or shutting down anytime soon.[/quote]

Do you see Frantech becoming a huge VPS providing company in the near future, as big as vpsland, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows/Linux VPS' w/ Free webhosting, unmetered cache hosting, offloaded MySQL!
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“gikid, post:1, topic:306452”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=402568.msg2982949#msg2982949 date=1254716327]

Whether it is a Canadian company or not, doesn’t being hosted in Portland, Oregon, USA make it subject to the DMCA? It’s not like you own the datacenter, so lawyers could go over your heads to shut you down, right?

PS, I like frantech, just checking on this claim.

They could go to the ISP: DirectSpace Networks, LLC. And get them to shut it down, but why would they waste their time.
[/quote]

Also to you moparisthebest

Well, Fran works at DirectSpace as well as Frantech (he actually lives in the datacenter, no joke). Jagex has already contacted DirectSpace about Frantech hosting 2speced, and Fran pretty much told them to fuck off. We haven’t seen anything since then. Also, we’ll soon be offering uh, “Virtual” Offshore Hosting… We have a /21 (2048 addresses) block of Romanian IP addresses that we can assign to VPS’s coming in soon.

We pretty much just disputed to Jagex what was legit and what wasn’t, and they were like “ok whatever bye”[/quote]

Oh so you got the inside hook-ups, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows/Linux VPS' w/ Free webhosting, unmetered cache hosting, offloaded MySQL!
item.dc:creator: @gikid gikid
item.description:
@gikid wrote:

UPDATE: There has been some price adjustments. Please check them out below if you have already seen this topic.

NOTE: Frantech is a Canadian based company, therefore we are not affected by DMCA. We have no problems telling Jagex to bite our shiny metal asses if they contact us about a private server.

Hey guys,

I’m a representative from Frantech Solutions. We’ve been wanting to kick off a service specifically for hosting Runescape Private Servers for a while now. Now that we’re almost settled into our new datacenter (Pittock Internet Exchange) in Portland, Oregon, we’ve decided that we’re ready to start up a Runescape specific hosting service.

At the moment, we have 7 hardware nodes (machines that the VPS’s are run on). I’ll list them and their spec’s below.

Hostname: talho.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: renton.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: eureka.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: anemone.pdxhost.net Operating System: Linux CentOS 5 64-bit Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 24GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5520's (Intel i7) - Each processor has 4 cores with hyperthreading per core so a total of 16 2.27GHz cores - Four 640GB SATA II hard drives in a RAID 10 configuration
Hostname: dominic.pdxhost.net Operating System: Windows Server 2003 x64 Datacenter Edition Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 16GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5320's - Each processor is 4 cores for a total of 8 1.86GHz cores - Four 500GB SATA II hard drives
Hostname: dewey.pdxhost.net Operating System: Windows Server 2003 x64 Datacenter Edition Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 16GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5320's - Each processor is 4 cores for a total of 8 1.86GHz cores - Four 500GB SATA II hard drives
Hostname: axel.pdxhost.net Operating System: Windows Server 2003 x64 Datacenter Edition Connection: 1 Gbps Specs: - 16GB RAM - Dual Intel XEON 5320's - Each processor is 4 cores for a total of 8 1.86GHz cores - Four 500GB SATA II hard drives

With your Frantech VPS, you also get:

[ul][li]Free Webhosting[/li]
[li]Free Unmetered Cache/Client Hosting[/li]
[li]Free Offloaded MySQL[/li]
[li]Free Off-server Backup (5GB)[/li][/ul]

The Frantech Runescape VPS Plans are as follows:

[RS128] - 128 MB RAM (192MB Burst) - 5GB Hard disk space - $6/month USD

[RS256]

  • 256 MB RAM (386MB Burst)
  • 10GB Hard disk space
  • $9/month USD

[RS512]

  • 512 MB RAM (768MB Burst)
  • 20GB Hard disk space
  • $12.50/month USD

[RS1024]

  • 1 GB RAM (1.5GB Burst)
  • 40GB Hard disk space
  • $25/month USD

[RS2048]

  • 2 GB RAM
  • 80GB Hard disk space
  • $45/month USD

[RS4096]

  • 4 GB RAM
  • 160GB Hard disk space
  • $99/month USD

[size=16pt]Order here: http://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?gid=8[/size]

Operating System Options: Most Linux Distributions (just ask), Windows Server 2003 Enterprise Edition 64-bit
Windows is now FREE!
(We demo’d Windows Server 2008 Enterprise but it was highly impractical. It required 600MB RAM just to boot. Sorry guys, blame Microsoft.)

To contact us, you can:
Submit a ticket at http://my.frantech.ca/
Join us in our IRC channel at irc.deltaanime.net #frantech
or message djt_93@hotmail.com on MSN.

All hardware is owned, colocated, and operated by Frantech and Frantech alone.
99.9% uptime for now, but may rise as we get settled in more.
Frantech uses Virtuozzo for Guest System Virtualization. [Xen is available on a per request basis – submit a ticket]
[size=13pt]We offer 24 hour free trials of our VPS’s.[/size]
– Submit a ticket requesting a trial. Include the plan, and the time you want the trial in the ticket.

Some pictures
------------------
Screenshot of top in an ssh session with talho: http://frantech.ca/pdx/16_cpuzzzzz.png
Xeon 5520 and heatsink: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAG0071.jpg
Xeon 5520: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAG0072.jpg
RAM: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAG0075.jpg
More Xeon 5520’s: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_069.jpg
Chassis of talho: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_070.jpg
talho almost assembled: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_073.jpg
talho almost assembled again: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_074.jpg
RAID 1 performance on talho: http://frantech.ca/pdx/IMAGE_076.jpg (reads 11GB/s, writes 110MB/s - our RAID 10 setup does 11GB/s read and 250MB/s write)
------------------

Last but not least… /proc/cpuinfo of talho: http://frantech.ca/pdx/cpuinfo

Looking forward to seeing you,
mepholic/gikid and Frantech staff

– mods: I talked to Taharok on IRC, he told me he will approve this.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows/Linux VPS' w/ Free webhosting, unmetered cache hosting, offloaded MySQL!
